storyInfo: The strange creatures are extremely tough, with the group powerless to resist them. Dorothy makes contact and leads the group deeper into the test site.

attributes.content: I have to admit, I wasn't expecting that.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Neither was I.;Up until I saw Saria do it...

attributes.content: Rest assured. I have no intention of going back to prison either.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Then that makes cleaning up the scene of the crime here a lot easier.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: After all, I'm a mechanist. Won't take much time to pull a machine apart.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: But I'm wondering... How did you know it was empty inside?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I've sparred with this power suit a few times before.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You've been hunted by them too?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: In a sense.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.options: They're not out for Saria.;......;Could be the other way around, honestly...

attributes.content: If they're showing up here, that goes to show someone really doesn't want us tracking Muelsyse's whereabouts.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Who's that someone going to be?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: There are many possibilities.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I don't contact Muelsyse much. I only know she was participating in some Rhine Lab-headed secret experiment before she disappeared.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Considering I left Rhine long ago, her divulging as much to me already violated her NDA.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Does Rhine Defense dispatch cutting-edge weapons to eliminate info-leaking employees?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Got it. That's non-disclosure too.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Rhodes Island sure is a friendly enterprise, isn't it, Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Rhodes Island isn't just an enterprise.;......;How else did we get either of you?

attributes.content: Muelsyse isn't an ordinary Rhine Lab employee.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: If they can drive her to the edge, their professionalism has to be on par with mine.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: This model of power armor made a showing in certain mercenary groups about half a year ago.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Neither its defensive material nor its equipped weaponry are outstanding. All in all, it's comparable to military-manufactured power armor from five years ago.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Save for one very notable point—it doesn't demand anything from its user.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Anything... how low do the requirements go?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Any being whose physiological parameters can maintain a standard exercise state satisfies the requirements.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I can, you can, and the Doctor can.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.options: Yeah, that's low.;......;I'm kind of dying to try.

attributes.content: You won't like the feeling of it, Doctor, I can guarantee you.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Only crack troops used to be able to wear power armor.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Picture controlling that giant contraption for extended periods of fighting, and not drowning in your own vomit in the process—it genuinely wasn't something anyone could do without training.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Ask Dur-nar, she'll tell you. She says she wore it one time ever, and it made her want to quit the military right then and there.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I imagine these intervening years have been enough for them to iterate the technology a couple dozen times over, and there's no shortage of vets among the mercenaries...
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: But for anyone to wear it?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: That's an invention that might change how whole wars are fought.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Similar power armors are only out there in extremely low numbers, which makes it obvious this tech is only in its prototype phase.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'm on the trail of its source right now. Getting leads isn't a cakewalk, as with so many other experimental weapons.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.options: Are Columbia's mercenaries that rich?;This power armor's extremely advanced tech, right?

attributes.content: The mercs may not be clients.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: In the eyes of the people who order this stuff, mercenaries and these latest power suits are interchangeable—
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: —It's only experimental.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The edge projected from nomadic cities is often the boundary where the rules of civilization no longer apply.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The mercenaries active in the barrens, same as the Pioneers, are the most convenient test subjects.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Even if an experiment fails, and they're disposed of, hardly anyone is going to pursue their whereabouts.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: And soon enough, the next batch of test subjects gets funneled in.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.options: Don't any of them fight it?

attributes.content: No point in fighting it.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The mercenaries are fully aware the new weapons in their hands could explode, but they could also be stronger than whatever their opponents are wielding.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Legally, these mutually consenting deals are on the verge of compliance.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Mr. Mechanist, have you discovered anything new?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Something feels off...
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Something's felt off from the very beginning.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Nobody in the power armor—how did I not tell that at a glance?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The mercs could be remote-controlling it from a distance, or maybe they set it up with automated programming—but no matter what, there'd be distinct patterns in its behavior.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Just like Closure's drones.;Just like Lancet-2 and Castle-3.

attributes.content: Obviously, they're not that flexible.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Even the highest grade of automation out of the newest crop of Rhodes Island's R&D weaponry wouldn't escape my eyes—you want me to believe that bunch of dumb army-funded mechanists could pull it off?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: What are you doing?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Severing the power armor's 'central nerves.'
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: There's something dripping out of these tubes... a silver liquid.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: What is this substance?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Maybe it's the answer to your question.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Did we... get away?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: *pant*... I... I haven't run this fast in a long time...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What exactly was...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It followed us?!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Get down!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: This isn't the same one as before...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There're at least ten—even more, actually. They've surrounded the living quarters.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: They're... multiplying.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Multiplying? Have you seen those things before? Explain!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Dr. Urbica, shouldn't you be the one explaining?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What the ever-loving hell do you mean...?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Move—!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: —This thing's too fast!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I don't want to imagine what happens if it touches you—do you think we should head back inside?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Better we don't.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: That's... the building we were in...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Under an invisible, massively powerful attack, the Pioneers' hut violently sways, the flimsy windows and doors shattering in quick succession.
At practically the same time, the peculiar objects that were hanging in the air before fly straight at the room.
Silver liquid oozes through the cracks in every frame at lightning speed, just as a minute creature would smell blood and dig fearlessly into its prey's wounds.
But in the next instant, something that defies all comprehension, including the scientists', decides to take place.
Did that building just... disappear?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: No. It didn't disappear—it was disintegrated.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Do you see those... things floating in the air?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're trying to tell me that—used to be part of the building?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I fear that may be the entire building.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Just as her voice falls silent, the fragments frozen in midair come falling down one after another.
Cacophony, dust, detritus everywhere, like the restarting of a clock stopped by force—and everything that existed by all rights returns.
Did... Did I get hit by some kind of mind-control Arts?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I mean, if not, then everything I just saw... somehow violated every law of physics I know.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It's the work of those silver liquids.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: They... dispersed into innumerable minute individuals, dismantled and lifted away what was a section of that room...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And then reassembled it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Like there were dozens of invisible... hands?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Sounds like you ladies are talking about ghosts.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Wait, Ptilopsis—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Shit, Joyce was just in that room!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Don't tell me she got...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Myers! You made it out too?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: S—Sir... I got... Doc Moore... outta there...
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Joyce!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Th—Thank God... she's okay...
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: His wounds aren't severe, but his endurance has been overtaxed. He urgently needs rest.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We can't hang around this place. None of the Pioneer quarters are safe anymore.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Did you see that?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I don't know what you're referring to.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Knock it off, I know you're not that dumb. Did you not feel that tremor just now?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Were those floaty things some new model of drone or something? You Rhiners developed those yourself? Dammit!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I can only tell you that we did not take any action against the site, on your orders.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Who was your boss, again? Ferdinand?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Mr. Ferdinand Clooney is the Director of Rhine Lab's Energy Section.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: I don't care how your company's structured.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Give me your comm. I want to talk to him.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Director Clooney is extremely busy...
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Then I'm gonna need you to pass along a message—
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Ask if he knows what a bastard he is!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Director, you have a message, sent from observation at the site.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Well, well...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Also, your son appears to need you for something. Should I put him through?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Same play. Tell him I'm busy.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Right, send the contents of Elena's most recent report to my terminal.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: On it, Director.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: How many times have I told you? Don't call me Director.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Ah! Sorry, Mr. Clooney.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Speaking of Elena...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I gather you get along well with her.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Brainstorm for me. What kind of present would she like?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: ...Olivia.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm sorry, treating the wounded Pioneers has me occupied...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Are you hurt?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm... fine.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I don't have field experience like you do, but I can take care of myself, at least.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Even then... shouldn't we be evacuating ASAP?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: The whole site's in chaos... The Pioneers are busy with themselves. We've got a good opportunity to escape.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm positive the director got my message. He'll send people to fetch us.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Once we meet back up with our colleagues at Defense, we'll be in a perfect position to wipe out the threat to the site, and save Dorothy.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Maybe you're right.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Maybe?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: But I can't do it. It's not in my power to leave these people for dead.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Just now, they couldn't do it... leave Joyce for dead. You saw.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Doc Silence, we still got a few casualties here!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Drone—!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We're not gonna last much longer if they keep this up.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I've tried every way to attack it, no dice. Those freaks don't hurt, and they're impossible to break.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: We don't even... got nowhere to hide.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sir, why are you telling them all this?
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: They could be getting off on it!
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: These things above our heads are all mystery weapons sent out by the fuzz and the megacorps! They want us trapped in this test site forever—
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Sam, lay off that for now.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Everyone, I... I've got an idea...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Greyy... do you have some kind of proposal?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: *huff*... *huff*... *cough* *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Take your time. You were running too fast. Be careful not to bruise yourself.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I've noticed—those objects seem to chase after light, and human voices.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Watch...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: They're following your Arts' light ball, away into the air.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: *pant*... It's only temporary.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: My Arts aren't able to trick them for long.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: You've done all you can. And very well, at that.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Phototaxis... You've brought up an interesting line of thought.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Greyy, can you assist in evacuating the nearby Pioneers? They trust you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Move them somewhere dark, and tell them they need to keep quiet.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sure, I know what to do.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I've done work like this plenty of times with the senior operators...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Dr. Silence, you and Miss Elena take care too.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: What about us, then?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Make some signs of movement. The larger, the better. It has to cover the sounds of the others' footsteps at minimum.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: On it.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sam, call five or six guys over if you can, take whatever gear makes the most noise.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Are you seriously going along with them?
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: You got a better idea?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Whatever you say, boss.
attributes.name: Frontier Team Member

attributes.content: Draw every silver body to our location.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: So we act as bait—and then what?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: For now, stall as long as we can.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And then come to the laboratories.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: That voice...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Dorothy?!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Yes, it's me. Dorothy.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: I did a quick rig on the laboratory PAs—I hope I didn't scare you.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm completely safe. You don't need to worry about me.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: The laboratory buildings are sturdier, and they will help you resist the threat.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Everyone—be you Pioneer Team friends, or Rhine coworkers, the laboratories' doors are open to you.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice
